On 30 January 1915 , England played Scotland in a charity match organised by former England international and Northampton Saints captain Edgar Mobbs . After the match , 11 of the England team enlisted . In England , 1. 37 million men between the ages of 18 and 60 were enlisted . In December 1915 , the FA suspended all football leagues , stating that they recognised that “ as a good citizen , every man is morally bound to enter the forces and be prepared to give up his life for the common welfare of all . ” The FA declared that while the war would be in progress no football league should be in operation and suspended their league for the duration of the war . The Sakurajima volcano on Japan 's Kyushu island poses a `` growing threat '' , researchers at the University of Bristol say . The volcano , located 49 km ( 30 miles ) north of Japan 's second largest city Fukuoka , has seen explosive eruptions and ash clouds which disrupted flights at least six times this year . It had been dormant for nearly 30 years before becoming active in 1991 . Researchers have linked the activity on the volcano to `` stress fractures `` on the island 's seafloor . The researchers believe the island was created as magma rose through faults in the ocean and a huge chunk of land broke away from the edge of the continent about eight million years ago . The mass of submerged rock sank into the sea in a `` violent `` rupture , but a second rupture created the main island of Kyushu about 2 million years ago . The current activity could soon become `` more violent than anything it has experienced in the last 200 years `` says Dr David Tappin , assistant professor at Bristol . `` We need to focus on finding ways to communicate new insights that can help the emergency planners for the city of Kagoshima , and elsewhere , so they are prepared for the next eruption when it inevitably occurs , `` he says .
